WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to read an excel workbook of 20 worksheets with complex formula and it is taking around 7-10 minutes for the whole process, it take 5 minutes to read the content then another 2-5 minutes to write content into a new file. I have disabled pre-formula calculation it reduced it by 3 minutes which is not enouhg.
I have found away to load just the worksheet that I want to modify, but I couldnt find away to create a worksheet and apend it into existing excel workbook w/o reading the whole content of the workbook.
WorkItem.Summary: Insert new worksheet into exsisting excel workbook

Comments.Message: Unfortunately, that would not be possible because Excel worksheets all share several data structures (like strings used in worksheets). Therefore, it is required to know all sheets at the moment of writing data.
